projects.title: Flutter 2FA
projects.description: üîê This package to helps adds 2 Factor Authentiation in any flutter project with ease.
projects.attribution: Built with Flutter, Dart, Firebase and Firestore. This package is built to help developers add 2FA in their flutter projects with ease. It uses Firebase Auth and Firestore to store the 2FA secret key and QR code.
